name: meiotically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the act or process of meiosis (= a type of cell division): The primary spermatocytes divide meiotically to generate the secondary spermatocytes. These oocytes appear to be meiotically incompetent because they are juvenile.
More examplesFewer examplesThe yeast can no longer recombine meiotically to eliminate harmful mutations.They are studying meiotically heritable variations in gene function that cannot be explained by changes in DNA.These hybrids are meiotically regular and are fertile.
